text.en: The naturally arisen primordial protector Samantabhadra
Is intrinsically present, but in my delusion I fail to recognize it.
text.en-trans: rangché zhuk kyang trulpé dön ma tok

text.en: To the gurus and Three Jewels, I pray:
text.en-trans: chok sum lamar solwa tabpa lé

text.en: Bless me that I may recognize my own true face!
text.en-trans: rang ngo rang gi shepar jingyi lob
